		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://techcrunch.com/?p=1316256</guid>
		<description><img width="680" height="527" src="https://tctechcrunch2011.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/shutterstock_53958034-e1403546765436.jpg?w=680" class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image" alt="shutterstock_53958034" />&nbsp;The healthcare industry, with its maddening inefficiencies and an economic model that incentivizes disease care over health care, desperately needs a Silicon Valley-style overhaul. Why is the nation&#8217;s $3 trillion creaky, monstrous and convoluted healthcare sector seemingly impervious to technological change? <a href="http://techcrunch.com/2016/05/11/disrupting-healthcare-is-a-tough-task-for-startups-and-venture-capital/?ncid=rss">Read More</a><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/techcrunch/startups/~4/ysqitw4aGzY" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<media:thumbnail url="http://tctechcrunch2011.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/shutterstock_53958034-e1403546765436.jpg?w=150" />
		<media:content url="http://tctechcrunch2011.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/shutterstock_53958034-e1403546765436.jpg?w=150" medium="image">

		<title>Front makes email collaboration much smoother</title>
		<link>http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/techcrunch/startups/~3/KfvBZUURBBQ/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 May 2016 16:56:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[Romain Dillet]]></dc:creator>
				<category><![CDATA[Startups]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[TC]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[Front]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[FrontApp]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[SaaS]]></category>
		<category><![CDATA[France Newsletter]]></category>

		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://tctechcrunch2011.wordpress.com/?p=1321281</guid>
		<description><img width="680" height="489" src="https://tctechcrunch2011.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/email-buried1.jpg?w=680" class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image" alt="email buried" />&nbsp;Front started out as an app to manage shared email addresses. With Front, you can collaborate, comment, assign and reply to those pesky emails that you receive on your support@, jobs@ or contact@ email addresses. After adding more channels, Front has released a major update to refine its service with more power <a href="http://techcrunch.com/2016/05/11/front-makes-email-collaboration-much-smoother/?ncid=rss">Read More</a><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/techcrunch/startups/~4/KfvBZUURBBQ" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>
